org.lwjgl.opencl

Class CLPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.opencl.CLPlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class CLPlatform
extends Pointer.Default
    This class represents an OpenCL platform. It wraps a cl_platform_id pointer and a CLCapabilities instance that exposes the platform capabilities.

    This class is not required to use OpenCL, but is provided for easy discovery of OpenCL platforms and corresponding devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public CLCapabilities getCapabilities()
        Returns the CLCapabilities instance associated with this OpenCL platform.

      • createCapabilities

        public static CLCapabilities createCapabilities(long cl_platform_id)
        Creates a CLCapabilities instance for the specified OpenCL platform.

        This method call is relatively expensive. The result should be cached and reused.

        Parameters:
        cl_platform_id - the platform to query
        Returns:
        the instance

      • getPlatforms

        public static java.util.List<CLPlatform> getPlatforms()
        Returns a list of all the available platforms.
        Returns:
        the available platforms

        Returns:
